$('#hideTicketNum').val(ticketNum); $('#save').hide(); $('#submit').hide(); $('#resubmit').show(); $('#newProposal').modal('show'); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } }); } function cleanApprovalError(){ $('#errMsg').html(''); <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;

	/* data from server */
	var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
	var userId = c.data.info.userId;
	$scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "chair";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { 
		tableId: 'chair_view_table',
		panelHeadingId: 'heading_chairViewItems', 
		collapseTarget: 'collapseChairViewItems', 
		panelTitle: 'Proposals Waiting for Chairman Review' 
	};
	
 	$scope.paginationId = "chairViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	 $scope.sort=function(keyname){	
			$scope.sortKey = keyname;
			$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	 };
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('chairman');
		$('#optionDiv').html(bropConstantsService.getBioMemberOption(sessionId));
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
	};	
	
	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#chair_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#chair_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
	
	function getSearchParameters() {
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + error);
	}
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#chair_view_table').hide();
    $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		getData();
	 }
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>dwcr</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Waiting for Chairman Review</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_CHAIR');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 14:37:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>06f77151dbd81f40f59974131f96192d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Waiting for Chairman Review</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_06f77151dbd81f40f59974131f96192d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-23 21:56:22</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>        ]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>bropConstantsService</name><script><![CDATA[function bropConstantsService() {
this.applicationName = "BROP"; this.catItemDesc = "DCEG Resource Requisition Application"; this.names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
this.textFields = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
this.checkboxes = ["imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask"]; this.itemIdArray = null; this.cat_item_id = ""; this.bioMemberOption = "";
this.imageData = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'; this.getApplicationName = function() {return this.applicationName;}; this.getCatItemDesc = function() {return this.catItemDesc;}; this.getNames = function() {return this.names;}; this.getTextFields = function() {return this.textFields;}; this.getCheckboxes = function() {return this.checkboxes;}; this.getImageData = function() {return this.imageData;}; this.getCatItemId = function() {return this.cat_item_id;};
this.getBioMemberOption = function() { return getBioHourOption();}; this.getItemIdArray = function() { return this.itemIdArray; }; this.setCatItemId = function(val) {this.cat_item_id = val; }; this.setBioMemberOption = function(val) {this.bioMemberOption = val; }; this.setItemIdArray = function(val) {this.itemIdArray = val; }; var that = this; this.getBioMemberOption = function(sessionId) { var options;
$.ajax({ dataType: "json", type: "GET", url: "/api/naci/getdata/getBioinformaticianGroupMember", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, async: false, success: function(data){ options = data.result[0].option; // that.setBioMemberOption(data.result[0].option); }, error: function(data){ alert("ERROR"); } });
return options; };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-01 14:42:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>791c3a05db0c5340f59974131f96193d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bropConstantsService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_791c3a05db0c5340f59974131f96193d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-23 22:07:40</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_8dfb8d1bdba15380f59974131f9619c7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, spUtil, bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService, bropRequestDetailsService, bropActionControlService, bropConstantsService) {
    /* widget controller */	
    var c = this;
	
	/* data from server */
  var sessionId = c.data.info.sessionId;
  var userId = c.data.info.userId;
  $scope.canView = c.data.info.canView;
	
	/* local variables */
    var method = "secreatryTransfer";
	
	/* scope variables and functions */
	$scope.panelInfo = { tableId: 'secretary_transfer_view_table', 
						 panelHeadingId: 'heading_transferViewItems', 
						 collapseTarget: 'collapseTransferViewItems', 
						 panelTitle: 'Transferred Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Review' 
					   };
	
	$scope.tableColumns = [
		{'name': 'number', 'text': 'BROP ID',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_number'},
		{'name': 'name', 'text': 'Principal Investigator',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'projectName', 'text': 'Project Name',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedBy', 'text': 'Submitted By',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'submittedDate', 'text': 'Submitted Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'stage', 'text': 'Status',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'lastUpdateDate', 'text': 'Last Update Date',  'sortable': true, 'cssClass': 'ritm_cat_item'},
		{'name': 'actions', 'text': 'Actions',  'sortable': false}
	];

	$scope.paginationId = "transferViewDataPagination";
	
	$scope.actions = [ 
		{ 'type': 'button', 'action': 'displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);', 'text': 'View' },			   
		{ 'type': 'link', 'action': '$sp.do?id=dceg_report_page&sys_id={{data.requestId}}', 'text': 'Export' }	
	];
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname) {		
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;
		$scope.reverse = !scope.reverse;
	};	
	
	$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
		bropActionControlService.showActionButton('secretaryTransfer');
		bropRequestDetailsService.getData(sessionId, id, approvalId).then(handleResponse, handleError);
		$('#optionDiv').html(bropConstantsService.getBioMemberOption(sessionId));
	};	
	

	/* local functions */
    function handleRequestDataResponse(results) {
        $scope.myData = results;
        $scope.count = results.length;
        if ($scope.count == 0) {
			$scope.hasData = false;
            $('#secretary_transfer_view_table').hide();
        } else {
			$scope.hasData = true;
            $('#secretary_transfer_view_table').show();
        }
		$scope.$apply();
    }
		
	function getSearchParameters() {
		
		return {type: method, userId: userId, catDesc: bropConstantsService.getCatItemDesc() };
	}
	
	function handleResponse() {
		$scope.$apply(); 
	}
		
	function handleError(error) {
        alert('ERROR: ' + JSON.stringify(error));
  }
	
	function getData() {
		var searchParams = getSearchParameters();
		bropRequestDataThroughApproverTableService.getData(sessionId, searchParams)
		.then(handleRequestDataResponse, handleError);
	}
	
	/* initialization */
	$('#secretary_transfer_view_table').hide();
  $scope.myData = [];
	if ($scope.canView) {
		 getData();
	}
	
	spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() {  
		getData();
	});	
	
}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Table displaying proposals awaiting secretary review of transferred proposals</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>DCEG Secretary Transfer View</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var user = gs.getUser();
	var canView = user.isMemberOf('DCEG_SECRETARY');

	data.info = {
		userId: userId,
		sessionId: session_id,
		canView: canView
	};	
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yankovsr@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-23 19:51:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8dfb8d1bdba15380f59974131f9619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG Secretary Transfer View</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_8dfb8d1bdba15380f59974131f9619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-23 21:57:58</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<brop-panel ng-if="canView && hasData"></brop-panel>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

} function callDeleteSave(){ var data = getDeleteParam(); var param = JSON.stringify(data); var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/savedata', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var result = response.data.result; } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function getDeleteParam(){ var variables ={}; variables.action = 'delete'; variables.user_id = userId; variables.applicationName = applicationName; variables.savedId = recId; return [variables]; } function loadSavedDetails(id){ clearForm(); $('#resubmit').hide(); $('#submit').show(); $('#save').show(); getSavedRequestById(id); } function getSavedRequestById(id){ var request = { url: '/api/naci/getdata/getDataById', method: 'GET', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: {savedId: id} }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var variables = response.data.result[0].variable; for(key in variables){ if(textFields.indexOf(key) > -1){ if(key == 'requestDate' || key == 'needDate'){ $('#'+key).val(getConvertedValue(variables[key], 1)); }else{ $('#'+key).val(variables[key]); if(key == 'whereRun'){ if(variables[key] == 'other'){ $('#otherPlace').show(); }else{ $('#otherPlace').hide(); } } } }else{ if(variables[key] == 'true'){ $('#'+key).prop('checked', true); if(key == 'otherTask'){ $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false); } }else{ $('#'+key).prop('checked', false); } } } $('#hideValue').val(id); $('#newProposal').modal('show'); } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function clearForm(){ for(var index=0; index < names.length; index++) { if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[index]).val(''); }else{ $('#'+names[index]).prop('checked', false); } } $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true); $('#otherPlace').hide(); } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(!value || 0 == value.length){ return ""; } var values = ''; if(flag == '0'){ values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "u_dceg_rrs_saved_request", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalseddptfalseDCEG Draft Proposal Table falsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-01-23 19:22:09false38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f96196975DCEG Draft Proposal Table globalfalseglobalsp_widget_38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f961969zhoujim@nih.gov2018-04-23 22:31:15
